ui.description: UI components library - Reusable React components, hooks, utilities. Customize directories to match your component library location.

web.description: Next.js web application - App router pages, layouts, client/server components. Adjust directories for your Next.js structure.

api.description: Backend API layer - FastAPI routers, services, repositories, schemas. Use apiLayers for granular access by architectural layer.

cli.description: Command-line interface utilities - CLI commands, argument parsing, user interaction.

routers.description: API route handlers - FastAPI routers, endpoints, request/response handling

services.description: Business logic services - Orchestration, validation, domain operations

repositories.description: Data access layer - Database queries, ORM operations, RLS enforcement

schemas.description: Data Transfer Objects - Pydantic models for API serialization and validation

cores.description: Core utilities - Auth, observability, middleware, error handling

metadata.description: Template for React + TypeScript monorepo with FastAPI backend. Common patterns: Radix UI, React Query, Tailwind, SQLAlchemy, Pydantic. Customize directories, domains, and layers to match your project structure.
